title: Flag
description: multi-colored beads and sequins with large heart shape in middle; inside heart: pipe smoking woman in profile with long, black pony tail; green snake inside edge of heart; two multicolored, beaded and sequined snakes around heart; letters \"Gouinard\" at lower left of heart; pink background of heart; blue background for rest of design area; black fabric border on all 4 sides
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
